decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The proposed change of use from A2 (Internet Cafe) to A3 (Restaurant) would harm the living conditions of neighbours by way of increased noise, litter an disturbance contrary to Unitary Development Plan policies ENV-B.1.1 (All New Development) and S.2.2 (Non-Retail Uses in Other Shopping Areas) of The London Borough of Hounslow UDP, adopted December 2003.

Condition : 2 - Due to the location of the proposed restaurant and takeaway facility on a busy highways and the inability to provide any off-street parking, the proposal would create conditions prejudicial to the free flow of traffic and would harm the safety of pedestrians and vehicles contrary to policies T.1.4 (Car and Cycle Parking and Servicing Facilities for Developments) and T.4.1 (Traffic Implications of New Development) of the London Borough of Hounslow UDP
description: Change of use from A2 to A3 (hot food takeaway and delivery service).
